content: turn 4 sts row 35 36 csdc double_crochet across turn row 37 csdc double_crochet decrease double_crochet 1 turn 3 sts row 38 39 csdc double_crochet across turn row 40 csdc double_crochet decrease 2 sts fasten_off with long enough tail to weave in later eye sclera make 2 using white dk and 3 5mm hook create a magic loop row 1 csdc 15 double_crochet into magic loop join with slip_stitch 16 sts row 2 csdc double_crochet into same st increase 2 double_crochet into each st increase join with slip_stitch 32 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail to sew with eye pupil make 2 using black dk and 3 5mm hook create a magic loop row 1 csdc 15 double_crochet into magic loop join with slip_stitch 16 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail to sew with construction sew each pupil onto sclera slightly off centre sew eyes onto main scarf at the head end weave in all ends
